Campus Filming Closes Section of Fowler Street
Due to filming activity, the section of Fowler Street between 10th Street and Ferst Drive will be closed to vehicular traffic the morning of Wednesday, Jan. 10, from approximately 6 to 10 a.m.
Facebook
Twitter
Email
Jan 08, 2024
Due to filming activity, the section of Fowler Street between 10th Street and Ferst Drive will be closed to vehicular traffic the morning of Wednesday, Jan. 10, from approximately 6 to 10 a.m. Motorists are encouraged to use Techwood Drive for access to facilities in the vicinity.
In addition, street parking will be unavailable along this section of Fowler Street on Jan. 10 from midnight to 8 p.m. Parking permit holders have been notified to plan accordingly.
Nearby pedestrian traffic along Ferst Drive may be held periodically during the time of the street closure. As such, plan for additional time if you need to walk through this area.
Contact
Julie Birchfield
Assistant Director of Film Logistics and Business Development
Email
Julie.Birchfield@gatech.edu
